title: How to Counter Vayne
body:
I will grant that a late game Vayne doesn't have many weaknesses and she almost always 1v1 anyone at that point but in a teamfight she can be nullified.  The trick is to focus more on attack speed reduction rather then tanky stats in general.  {{item:3110}} and {{item:3082}} are the key items.  Picking {{summoner:3}} can help a lot as she needs to get really close to deal her damage so that puts her within range of Exhaust.

Champions that work well against Vayne are {{champion:34}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:54}} as they can hit her AS really hard.

This is a really short list I know, I do wish there were more options to reduce attack speed in the game as there are a lot of champions that like to build attack speed and there is very little that can reduce that.

replies.body: And pink wards. Also things like the mythical upgraded trinket should work too.

You forgot these two as well, {{champion:104}} {{champion:119}} , Graves should be able to burst her down, and Draven is one of her true counters that hasn't been hit to hard, provided he can use his passive properly.

ADC {{champion:85}} Shrek in lane every time and if she tries to all in you, you can actually peel for your self and stun her. She has no way to poke back and if she tumbles into you their screwed. Although at higher levels this is an even matchup against inexperienced Vayne's  they aren't gonna know what the hell to do.

Another option is to simply take early-lane champions with high harass and burst. Lucian, Graves, and Draven for example. Take these along with an aggressive support like Thresh or Leona and you're solid to shut her down for the rest of the game just through lane.

Yes, her early game isn't as bad as everyone says it is, but it's still pretty weak in comparison to others (like the aforementioned adcs/supports above)
